import api from'./api';export const inventoryService={getAllLogs:async()=>{const response=await api.get('/inventory/logs');return response.data;},createInventoryLog:async logData=>{const response=await api.post('/inventory/logs',logData);return response.data;},getInventoryStats:async()=>{const response=await api.get('/inventory/stats');return response.data;},getInventoryReports:async()=>{const response=await api.get('/inventory/reports');return response.data;},updateStock:async(productId,quantity,type,notes)=>{const response=await api.post('/inventory/update-stock',{productId,quantity,type,// 'IN' or 'OUT'
notes});return response.data;}};
